summary: Saga Koppen is my NPC and follower version of my main Skyrim save. She is a battle mage.
descriptionHtml:
Saga Koppen is my NPC and follower version of my main Skyrim save. Saga is a battle mage, specialising in destruction magic. Though she also casts frost and shock magic, her strong suit is her fire spells of which she can cast master level spells. She also has some skills within conjuration, restoration, alteration and illusion, though these are more limited.
She can be found in the Hall of the Elements at the College of Winterhold.
She starts out at level 50, and will level up with the player.

From what I gather, she doesnâ€™t appear before finishing the College main quest (due to the entire area developing into a battleground before this quest is completed).

If there are any problems let me know and I will see if I can fix it.

You don\'t need any of the add-ons but you may need the hair mod:
Hair by Apachii: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
For anyone who may be wondering, the robes are part of a comprehensive clothing retexture mod which is not required. Retexture by MissObsidienne: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19826
author: Saga
